Subversion 1.4 is out and has some nice new features (release notes). There's a webcast of the new features (bit boring). For me the svnsync command looks neat and the Apple keychain support will be very welcome for all those passwords. You can grab a OSX version pre-compiled. For Windows XP, TortoiseSVN is a lovely client. On a Mac we tend to use svnX. Still need persuading? Check out a free book
